extendedInfo.description: if you enjoy Open WordSearch or Open GCal Call Logger, please consider installing this additional app to donate $1.This is simply a donation front-end.This app allows direct communication to the developer, if you have feature requests this is a great way to get the developers attention.

reviews.comment: All the apps I use every day have to come from somewhere. And when I find a free one that I feel is worth a donation you make it easy to donate.thanx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Put a donate button in the app using Google Wallet
reviews.comment: This app is nice and all, but the CalCOOLator dev put donate buttons in the app. It was very handy.
reviews.author: A Google User
